page.title: 11Industry. Employment.
page.content: He keeps the number of animals the same every year. He has a problem with rabbits eating the crops. He sprays the crops to kill weeds and disease. Mr. Mercer is a school govenor. {Industry in Downton. The Tannery. Once Downton was well known for its paper making. Palmer and Son were the last to manufacture paper here. The paper mill closed in 1919. In the 18th and 19th centuries Downton lace was made: it became very famous. Here are some of the names of patterns: Church Windows, Downton Daisy, Tabitha, the Grecian. There has been a Tannery in Downton for over 300 years. We interviewed Mr. Birch at the Downton Tanning Company. Originally the river ran through the Tannery building to power the water wheel which drove the machinery. A metal water wheel still exists but only for show as electricty
